`{r}
library(dplyr)
library(readr)

player_league <- read_csv("data/derived/player_by_league_season.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)

league_summary <- player_league %>%
  group_by(league, season) %>%
  summarise(
    players = n_distinct(player),
    runs = sum(runs_scored, na.rm = TRUE),
    wickets = sum(wickets, na.rm = TRUE),
    .groups = "drop"
  )

league_summary
